ModMetaData.name: DocWorld Lite
ModMetaData.author: Leugimimi
ModMetaData.description:
One of the most ambitious efforts to reorganize RimWorld/Mods into a cleaner, better functioning, and intuitive system. This mod patches, fixes, and adds content to many mods (including but not limited to plain old vanilla RimWorld). <size=24>Features</size> * Balances recipes for various items * Enhances miniaturisation abilities * Increased "stuffable" items * Lights are now more efficient with power usage * Greatly improves inter-mod compatibility
Each setting can now be disabled in the mod settings menu! Restart required for them to take effect.
[Link to Full Feature List]https://github.com/DrZhivago1/DocWorld/wiki/1.-Content-Overview
[Link to GitHub]https://github.com/DrZhivago1/DocWorld/releases
